questions.question: Who was the emperor at the time of Marco Polo's arrival in China?
The emperor gave Marco Polo the title of governor of a Chinese city.

questions.question: What happened to Marco Polo when he returned to Italy?

choices.answer: He was captured and put in jail.
He became very sick from tuberculosis and died soon after.
He went to the university to become a doctor.

questions.resources: History.com Staff. "Marco Polo." History.com. A&E Television Networks, 2012. Web. 02 Nov. 2016.

questions.question: What happened while in jail?

choices.answer: He was soon freed from prison and continued fighting.
He entertained other prisoners with stories  of China.
He wrote down his adventures with a fellow prisoner.
He became sick from the awful conditions in the prison.

questions.resources: History.com Staff. "Marco Polo." History.com. A&E Television Networks, 2012. Web. 02 Nov. 2016.
